website_summaries.verdict: The latest 13-inch Retina Apple MacBook Pro gives you top-notch performance and more than 13 hours of battery life in a beautifully designed laptop. It's our top pick for high-end ultraportables.
pros: 13+ hours of battery life in our tests
Brilliant Retina display with higher-than-1080p resolution
Comes with iLife and iWork software suites
cons: Only upgradeable at time of order
Base 128GB Flash Storage capacity is small

customer_reviews.title: Computer is dead after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer in February 2018. In September is shut down and doesn't turn on. Repair center says it needs a new logic board. Its the 3rd mac that I buy on amazon that dies within a year due to some logic board issue. There's a reason they're selling them, and they knew they're selling defective products.
customer_reviews.author: figassis

customer_reviews.title: and am quite disappointed with CTMA
customer_reviews.text: This 15" MacBook Pro computer came in and problems were present from the start. Firstly there was a return slip in the box from a different customer. Obviously, this is rather strange, and it just continued. There was a dent of which the item description stated was not there on the lower right corner. Along with that, the screen was defective flickering white and also unable to locate the drive. MacBook Pro was also oddly enough missing from the lower bezel of the display. Issued a return, and am quite disappointed with CTMA.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money and is a great investment
customer_reviews.text: This MacBook Pro is so fast and so stable. The Retina display is beautiful. I can’t think of anything wrong with this laptop except the fact that the Mag charger is costly to replace ($60-$80).You will not be disappointed with this superb device. If you’re looking to get a new MacBook Pro without the touch bar, I would suggest you try looking into this model and save yourself at least $1,000 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Wretched1

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect
customer_reviews.text: From the bottom of my heart, thank you. Honest company that just gives you what you ordered, nothing more, nothing less. Ordered a MacBook Pro, beautiful condition, with original charger. No false advertising, they listed the quality as ‘like new’ and they were 10000% true to their word. Took me so long to save for a new laptop after someone stole my brand new MacBook last year and this was just perfect. Feels like I have my old one, it was 2013 and the one I bought was 2014. So this was even better. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Once you go Mac, you never go back!
customer_reviews.text: I could talk for hours about how much I love this machine. It is my first Mac and first machine with a solid-state hard drive. Every thing works together in harmony unlike PCs, which I will never own again. Though lacking an ethernet port and CD drive, I have zero complaints. I understand why they aren't there. It cuts down on size and weight. Plus these days you don't use them as much as you used to. If you do need these options, you can buy them separately very inexpensively. This machine is crazy fast. Would buy again in a heartbeat! Is everything I ever wanted and then some in a laptop. PCs are trash!
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Apple does it again!
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop from Apple! Apple is unrivaled in terms of build quality and functionality. The retina screen is absolutely beautiful and the touchpad is the best touchpad to date. The pair allow for seamless navigation throughout the whole interface. Battery life is astonishing given the processing power and high resolution display. I can easily get 10 hours out of a full charge. Also, I find OS X much more simple and easy to use than Windows. Overall, a high quality laptop and a great value considering all this computer has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great 1yr later
customer_reviews.text: Had it for over a yr now and its been pretty good. Battery life does suck. I had to replace the charger it came with shortly after just cause i had to adjust it so mAny times before it worked. I took it to apple store to make sure it was legit (i dont know much about computers) and they said the previous owner or whatever did diagnostic check on it thats stronger than apples, idek how thats possible but it made me feel good. I still have laptop now in good shape but i dont do much on it but edit photography Using apple software and did school work on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Desktop-fast laptop with a beautiful, high-resolution screen
customer_reviews.text: I use this machine for writing for several hours a day, usually with a half-dozen applications open at a time. It's performance is probably overkill for my needs, but I love it. And it's a bit like a garage door opener. Once you've used its retina display, you'll wonder how you got by with anything less. Relatively light, powerful, beautiful text rendition — what's not to like? I subtracted a star because it's a pricey son of a gun. That said, I find it worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome computer
customer_reviews.text: Great computer! it’s used but in great condition. As a broke college student I was hoping I wasn’t going to get ripped off and I’m really happy I wasn’t. The price is great, the computer works perfectly fine, 10/10 would recommend! The first 3 photos are from when I first got the computer and the last one is from a month after I received the computer. The computer had a few scratches and a small dent on the front but I mean it’s a used computer and it said it had a few scratches so it was expected.

customer_reviews.title: Great seller. Will buy from him any time
customer_reviews.text: Great seller. Will buy from him any time. Seller added a surprice feature as well. I got more value which included 1 more year of Apple original warranty and additional 256Gig of SSD.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop to replace the previous year's model because the screen constantly jumped to another screen with little or no provocation. I was really frustrated with it! This one is much more stable, fast, and I love the retina display. I review a lot of CDs, so I miss the internal disc drive, but bought an external drive that works well. When I'm traveling, the lighter-weight computer does make a difference. I have been a Mac user since the SE, and I really like this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: An excellent piece of equipment. I had been in a cycle of burning through a computer every 1-2 years; I've had this for about a year and a half and it has not slowed down or shown any noticeable deterioration. Display is amazing, battery life is impeccable. Very happy I made this purchase; wouldn't forsee myself purchasing anything other than a Mac from now on. Although I was initially skeptical about the high price tag, you absolutely get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended, Reliable, Light and Thin
customer_reviews.text: I gave this computer to my husband as a birthday present and he absolutely loves it! He formerly had the 15" MacBook Pro, and this new version's lightness and thinness (due to lack of a CD drive) pleased him very very much. The speed is remarkable, and unlike the MacBook Airs recently released, this has NO PROBLEMS with connection to WIFI nor any problems with dropping WIFI connection. The battery life is outstanding and under normal use (web browsing and email) lasts longer than apple's estimates.
customer_reviews.author: A Writer

Overall the Mac is in great physical condition just unfortunate the WiFi card goes out within 2 months of having it.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMika

customer_reviews.title: Love this laptop, hate the HP I have at work....
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my 13" MacBook Pro with this 15" and I love it. I missed having a bigger screen and didn't know it. Not sure what else I can say about the unit, it's been flawless with zero issues, battery life is reasonable good, with normal use (surfing, some MS Office work) it lasts a good 6 hours with the screen brightness at about 80% typically. I haven't had the need to extending the battery but I'm sure using power management would extend it to the advertised 8 hours.

He was using our daughters old macbook. He loves it. The retina display is amazing too. Great little machine.

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard fails.........
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift in Nov 2015. Seller sent a pristine product with everything looking brand new. In Sep 2016,(less than a year) the trackpad stopped working & the keyboard keys started sticking or typing weird stuff. Took it to the shop and turns out we need to replace part # 661-8154 i.e. the topcase+ keyboard+battery+microphone. Just our luck we are just out of warranty and got quoted a $400 repair. APPLE products suck! Wish my wife would see the light & stop wasting money
